item.name: Graviton Blade
entries: On a hit, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be {@condition Restrained} until the start of your next turn.

item.name: Ring of Gravitic Control
entries: While wearing this ring, you have advantage on checks made to avoid being {@condition Grappled}.
Once per day, you can cast {@spell Levitate} without expending a spell slot.
